availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles Bollinger (Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, Superintendent of German Asylum)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, orphanage superintendent. Native of Bavaria, Germany. Married to Margaret Bollinger. Father of Lizzie Bollinger and Fred Bollinger. Teacher in Bavaria. Emigrated to the United States in c1850. Superintendent of the German Asylum orphanage in Louisville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, p. 703.
KYR-0001-004-1286.
